attributes.action: Write off student loan debt substantially, and reduce % repayments until 2022.
attributes.additional_details: There are countless subsidies and holidays for those who have jobs, or own companies. But what about the students who in 10 years time will be repaying the debt that is keeping those in jobs that may not exist in the future with a salary. We want a holiday too. We want a 50k grant too. We want our student loan written off!
attributes.background: Reduce the financial stress and burden on those who barely managed to get a job or are in desperate times, and trying to look after loved ones in this horrible financial crisis. We are the ones that are going to be taking on the burden of the country in the future.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Allow student loan holders to suspend their payments for up to 12 months.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559971

Reduce student loan debts by the cost of all tuition fees paid during Covid-19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560953
